trans-unit.source: Specifies the 3-D rotation to be used in a transformation.
trans-unit.target: 指定要轉換中使用的 3d 旋轉。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rotation3D"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rotation3D"> </xref>，製作這個物件值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （但可能已不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rotation3D"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rotation3D"></xref>物件，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、 資料繫結和動畫，但是其目前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Singleton identity <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rotation3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 單一識別<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rotation3D"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The identity <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rotation3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rotation3D"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Formats the value of the current instance using the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 目前的執行個體使用指定的格式將值格式化。

trans-unit.source: The format to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的格式。

trans-unit.source: -or- A null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) to use the default format defined for the type of the <xref:System.IFormattable> implementation.
trans-unit.target: -null 參考 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中) 若要使用的類型所定義的預設格式<xref:System.IFormattable>實作。</xref:System.IFormattable>

trans-unit.source: The provider to use to format the value.
trans-unit.target: 要用來格式化值提供者。

trans-unit.source: -or- A null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: -null 參考 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中) 從目前的地區設定的作業系統取得的數值格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: The value of the current instance in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 目前的執行個體中指定的格式的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a String that represents the current Object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回代表目前物件的字串。

trans-unit.source: String that represents the current Object.
trans-unit.target: 代表目前物件的字串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> using a specified format that represents the current <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.String>使用指定的格式，代表目前<xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Formats the value of the current instance using the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 目前的執行個體使用指定的格式將值格式化。

trans-unit.source: Text as a series of Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: 為一系列的 Unicode 字元的文字。
